gametext: If your [Episode VII] location on table, deploy on table. Your Force generation is + 1 at Jakku battlegrounds you occupy. During your deploy phase, may place a Resistance character from your hand on top of Used Pile to take a Resistance character from reserve deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)
name: A Brave Resistance

gametext: Your capital starships here are power +1. Once per game, may take Rogue One, a Hammerhead corvette, or a non-unique corvetter into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
name: Admiral Raddus

gametext: May add 1 pilot and 2 passengers. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. Once per turn, may deploy from Reserve deck a non-pilot Rebel of ability < 5 aboard; reshuffle. Immune to attrition < 4.
name: Blue 11

gametext: During any move phase, may fire a weapon at an Undercover spy. Permanent Weapon is Clone Sniper Rifle (may target a character or vehicle for free; target hit if destiny +2 > defense value).
name: CT-5385 (Tup)

gametext: When deployed (or if just lost), may take Throw Me Another Charge or a Trooper from reserve deck into hand; reshuffle. Opponent's troopers are power and forfeit -1 here. During any move pphase, may use 2 force to release an imprisoned captive here.
name: Commander Ruescott Melshi

gametext: USED: Cancel Broken Concentration, Lateral Damage, or Limited Resources. OR Place a card stacked on Droid Racks or Strategic Reserves in opponent's Lost Pile. (Immune to Sense) OR If you just drew starship for destiny, take that starship into hand to cancel and redraw that destiny. LOST: Use 3 Force to retrieve an Effect of any kind or an non-[maintenance] starship into hand.
name: Effective Repairs & Starship Levitation

gametext: Once per game, may place a non-immune to Alter Effect in owner's Used Pile. If both players just drew one battle destiny here, may use 2 Force (free if with an Imperial) to switch numbers. Opponent must first lose 2 Force to fire a superlaser.
name: Galen Erso

gametext: During battle, if alone or with a clone, may activate 1 Force or add 1 to a just drawn destiny. Once per game may take a clone or {Reflections III] lightsaber into hand from reserve deck; reshuffle. Immune to attrition < 6.
name: General Kenobi

gametext: While at a war room, at systems where you have two piloted snub fighters, opponent may draw no more than one battle destiny (you may not cancel those destiny draws) and opponent must use +1 Force to move an Imperial starship away.
lore: Engineer who worked with Jan Dodonna to design the A-wing starfighter. Given honorary rank due to his service to the Rebellion.
name: General Walex Blissex (V)

gametext: USED: If present with a Dark Jedi or [Episode I] Jedi, your Padawan is power + 2 for remainder of turn. OR Deploy from reserve deck on [Episode 1] lightsaber.  LOST: Once per game, retrieve a Padawan or [Episode I] lightsaber.
lore: A Jedi seeks nonviolent solutions to problems, but may fight to preserve the existence of life. An apprentice must learn which battle to fight and which to avoid.
name: Knights Of The Old Republic

gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. May move as a "react" for free. While at opponent's battleground, may not be targeted by opponent's Interrupts and your Force drains here may not be cancelled or reduced by opponent.
lore: Lak Sivrak is a typical Shistavanen male. Ferocious, but not aggresive. Often trained as \b scouts\b0 at Imperial academies, but they despise the ambitions of the New Order.
name: Lak Sivrak

gametext: Adds 2 to the power of anything she pilots. Your shuttling, landing, and taking off to or from here is free. Once per game, may use 1 Force to take Evacuation Control, a [Resistance] bomber, or a [Resistance] transport into hand from reserve deck; reshuffle.
name: Lieutenant Kaydel Connix

gametext: Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. Cancels opponent's immunity to attrition here. While at Scarif, adds 2 to attempts to "blow away" Shield Gate.
name: Lightmaker

gametext: If your character is about to be hit, use 1 Force (free if by permanent weapon) to prevent its forfeit from being reduced for remainder of turn. OR Cancel Disarmed. (Immune to Sense) OR Cancel a "react". OR During your move phase, target any or all of your characters at one site to "transport" (relocate) to an exterior or battleground site. Draw destiny. Use that much Force to "transport", or place Interrupt in Lost Pile.
name: Odin Nesloor & First Aid

gametext: May add 1 pilot and 1 astromech. While Luke piloting: maneuver + 2, immune to attrition, and you may initiate battles and Force drains here regardless of Objective restrictions.
lore: Luke's Incom T-65 X-wing at the Battle of Yavin. Instrumentation similarities between Red 5 and the T-16 skyhopper allowed Luke to play a pivotal role in the conflict.
name: Red 5 (V)

gametext: Deploy on table. While you occupy two battlegrounds (or opponent's site), you lose no more than 1 Force to Carbon-Freezing or That Thing's Operational. (Immune to Alter.) OR Deploy on a Star Destroyer or vehicle; its immunity to attrition is -4 and it may not "react".
lore: "With the Imperial Fleet spread throughout the galaxy in a vain effort to engage us, it is relatively unprotected."
name: Relatively Unprotected

gametext: USED: Peek at the top 3 cards of your Reserve Deck and take one into hand; reshuffle. OR Cancel a just drawn destiny targeting the ability or defense value of your non-Undercover character of ability < 5 at a system of mobile location. LOST: Cancel Close Call
name: Rescue In The Clouds (V)

gametext: Adds 2 to the power of anything she pilots. Permanent weapon is (*]Anakin's Lightsaber (may target a character for free; draw two destiny; target hit, its forfeit = 0, and you may retrieve 1 Force, if total destiny > defense value).
name: Rey With Lightsaber

gametext: If Finn is about to be lost from same site, may place him in you Used Pile instead. During your control phase, if present at a battleground site, and another Resistance character on table (of Paige out of play), may retrieve 1 Force.
name: Rose Tico

gametext: Attrition against opponent is + 1 here for each of their characters present. Opponent may not reduce your Force drains here. Once per game, if in battle with an Imperial or Rebel, may lose top card of Reserve Deck to cancel a non-immune to Sense Interrupt.
name: Saw Gerrera

dark_side_text: Unless your Star Destroyer here (or your Imperial at a related location), Force drain - 1 here.
gametext: While Rogue One is piloted by a rebel here, it is immune to attrition.   Unless your Star Destroyer here (or your Imperial at a related location), Force drain - 1 here.
light_side_text: While Rogue One is piloted by a rebel here, it is immune to attrition.
name: Scarif

dark_side_text: Your combat vehicles and Imperial troopers are each forfeit + 1 here.
gametext: Your combat vehicles, scouts, and spies are each power + 1 here. Force drain + 1 here.   Your combat vehicles and Imperial troopers are each forfeit + 1 here.
light_side_text: Your combat vehicles, scouts, and spies are each power + 1 here. Force drain + 1 here.
name: Scarif: Beach

dark_side_text: All immunity to attrition (and Ephant Mon's game text) here is cancelled.
gametext: While opponent occupies, Stardust (and any character it is on) may not move from here.   All immunity to attrition (and Ephant Mon's game text) here is cancelled.
light_side_text: While opponent occupies, Stardust (and any character it is on) may not move from here.
name: Scarif: Data Vault

dark_side_text: Your docking bay transit to or from here requires + 1 Force (+4 Force if Shield Gate on table.).
gametext: Your docking bay transit from here requires 2 Force. Your combat vehicles deploy + 1 here.    Your docking bay transit to or from here requires + 1 Force (+4 Force if Shield Gate on table.).
light_side_text: Your docking bay transit from here requires 2 Force. Your combat vehicles deploy + 1 here.
name: Scarif: Landing Pad Nine (Docking Bay)

dark_side_text: If you initiate a Force drain here, may rotate this site. Immune to Expand The Empire.
gametext: During your move phase, may move free between here and any related site.   If you initiate a Force drain here, may rotate this site. Immune to Expand The Empire.
light_side_text: During your move phase, may move free between here and any related site.
name: Scarif: Turbolift Complex

gametext: Deploy on Data Vault. At any time, may relocate Stardust to your spy present. During your control phase, in on your spy at a battleground you occupy, opponent loses 2 Force. If about to leave table, relocate to Data Vault (if possible). (Immune to Alter.)
name: Stardust

gametext: When deployed (or just lost), may draw bottom card of Used Pile. During battle, may subtract X (limit 3) from a just drawn weapon or battle destiny, where X = number of your spies out of play. Your spies here are immune to Nevar Yalnal.
name: Taidu Sefla

gametext: Plays on Your Destiny unless Leia or Luke has been deployed this game (even as a captive). [Death Star II] Luke and We're The Bait are lost. Opponent's Objective and [Death Star II] Effects target Leia instead of Luke. Force loss from Take Your Father's Place is - 1.
lore: Princess Leia Organa. Alderaanian Senator. Targeted by Vader for capture and interrogation. The Dark Lord of the Sith wanted her alive.
name: There Is Another (V)

gametext: [Front Side]: \ul Deploy Scarif system, Data Vault (with Stardust there), and Massassi War Room\ul0 \par \b For\b0  remainder of game, you may not deploy Jedi. Baze, Chirrut, and Rebel troopers are spies. \par \b While\b0  this side up, once per turn, may deploy from reserve deck a Rebel starship (except Home One or [Reflections III] Falcon) or a Scarif site; reshuffle. Each player's characters (except Imperials and spies) and vehicles deploy + 2 to Scarif sites that player does not occupy. \par \b Flip\b0  this card if you control two Scarif locations.\\par[Back Side]: \b While\b0  this side up, your spies are defense value + 2 (and power + 1 if with Stardust) and are immune to Undercover. While Stardust on your spy, opponent may not cancel your Force drains at battlegrounds. Once per turn, may place a Rebel in your Lost Pile out of play to cancel a just drawn destiny targeting the ability or defense value of your Rebel or to make a regular move with your spy during your control phase. \par \b Flip\b0 this card if you do not occupy two Scarif locations (unless Rogue One at a Scarif site you occupy).
name: They Have No Idea We're Coming/Until We Win, Or The Chances Are Spent

dark_side_text: If Yavin 4 system on table, Force drain - 1 here.
gametext: If Yavin 4 "blown away", Force loss is reduced by 4.   If Yavin 4 system on table, Force drain - 1 here.
light_side_text: If Yavin 4 "blown away", Force loss is reduced by 4.
name: Yavin 4: Massassi Ruins (V)

gametext: Deploys free to (and power + 2 at) a Cloud City, Jabba's Palace or Maz's Palace location. Once per turn, if you just drew an alien (or [independent] starship) for destiny, may take that card into hand to cancel and redraw that destiny.
lore: Male Ugnaught. Left Cloud City after the Empire took control. Works for Hermi Odle, helping to supply him with various weaponry. Hopes to someday return to Cloud City.
name: Yoxgit (V)

gametext: Deploy on table. Once per game, may take a Set 9 Epic Event into hand from reserve deck; reshuffle. During your deploy phase, if Krennic on Death Star, may flip Set Your Course For Alderaan (flip back at end of turn). (Immune to Alter.)
name: An Inkling Of Its Destructive Power (V)

gametext: During battle, lose
lore: "I shall assume full responsibility for losing them and apologize to Lord Vader." Needa discovered that Vader was only slightly more forgiving than the Emperor.
name: Apology Accepted (V)

gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots . While with Han, he may not add battle destiny draws or play Interrupts from Lost Pile. While at opponents battlegroun, opponent may not cancel or reduce your Force drains here.
name: Bala-Tik

gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. While with Vader in a battle you lost, Imperials and Imperial starships may be forfeited directly from your hand (for printed forfeit value) to reduce attrition and/or battle damage.
lore: Aide to Grand Moff Tarkin. Rarely underestimates enemies. Learned cunning and patience hunting big game as a youth.
name: Chief Bast (V)

gametext: Once per game, deploy on Death Star; it is hyperspeed = 2. Superlaser may not target planet systems. Once during your control phase, may fire Superlaser as follows: \par \b Prepare Single Reactor Ignition:\b0  If Death Star orbiting Jedha or Scarif, target your related unique (*) battleground site, even if converted (regardless of objective restrictions). Use X Force to target a planet system Death Star is orbiting. \par \b Fire!:\b0  Draw Destiny. \par \b It's Beautiful:\b0: If destiny +X > 8, site is "blown away", and opponent loses 3 force. \par X = number of Death Star sites on table.
name: Commence Primary Ignition (V)

gametext: USED: Take a card with "Death Squadron" in lore from reserve deck; reshuffle. LOST: Deploy an Imperial to a [Hoth} location from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
lore: "Make ready to land our troops beyond their energy field and deploy the fleet so that nothing gets off the system."
name: Death Squadron Assignment

characteristics: Female, \b information broker, spy, thief\b0, Trade Federation
gametext: Adds 1 to power of anything she pilots. Deploys free to an unoccupied site. Your droids are deploy -1 here. When deployed, may search your lost pile and move one card there to the top of that pile (if that card is a droid, may retrieve it into hand).
lore: Female \b information broker\b0 , \b spy\b0 and \b thief\b0. Trade Federation.
name: Dr. Chelli Lona Aphra

gametext: May add 1 pilot and 1 passenger. Matching starfighter for any First Order pilot of ability < 3. Power +1 at opponent's system. While matching pilot aboard, immune to attrition < 3,
name: First Order Special Forces TIE

dark_side_text: May be deployed instead of Alderaan by Set Your Course For Alderaan.
gametext: Baze, Chirrut, and Saw deplouy -1 here.      May be deployed instead of Alderaan by Set Your Course For Alderaan.
light_side_text: Baze, Chirrut, and Saw deplouy -1 here.
name: Jedha: Jedha City

gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Once per turn, if Death Star orbiting a battleground, may peek at top two cards of your Force Pile and take on into hand. Once per game, may take a non-unique Star Destroyer from reserve deck; reshuffle.
name: Krennic, Death Star Commandant

gametext: Adds 2 to the power of anyting he pilots. Permanent weapon is (*]Kylo's Lightsaber (may target a character for free; draw two destiny; target hit, and its forfeit = 0, and opponent loses 1 force, if total destiny > defense value; otherwise you lose 1 Force).
name: Kylo Ren With Lightsaber

gametext: If your character is about to be hit, use 1 Force (free if by permanent weapon) to prevent its forfeit from being reduced for remainder of turn. OR Cancel Disarmed. (Immune to Sense) OR Cancel a "react". OR During your move phase, target any or all of your characters at one site to "transport" (relocate) to an exterior or battleground site. Draw destiny. Use that much Force to "transport", or place Interrupt in Lost Pile.
name: Lana Dobreed & Sacrifice

dark_side_text: Once per game, may [Download] Vader here. During your move phase, Vader may move between here and any battleground site.
gametext: Once per game, may [Download] Vader here. During your move phase, Vader may move between here and any battleground site.
name: Mustafar: Vader's Castle

gametext: Deploy on table. AT-AT Cannons deploy -1, fire for free, and add 1 to armor. During your control phase, may take a non-[Jabba's Palace] vehicle weapon (without "lost" in game text), [Hoth] device, or [Hoth] Epic Event. (Immune to Alter.)
lore: Ruthless and well-equipped for both air and ground assault, Vader's feared Death Squadron came to the icy Rebel Base with total domination in mind.
name: Prepare For A Surface Attack (V)

gametext: If Agents Of Black Sun on table, deploy on table. May use 2 Force to [Download] Imperial Square. Once per turn, if Emperor on Coruscant, may draw top card of Force Pile (if during your turn and you occupy three battlegrounds, opponent also loses 1 Force). [Immune to Alter.]
name: Shadows Of The Empire

gametext: If you just initiated a battle where all your ability if provided by First Order characters and/or First Order starships, opponent loses 1 Force. If just lost, Kylo is power +3 until end of your next turn. Immune to attrition <8 (<4 if with Kylo).
name: Supreme Leader Snoke

gametext: Deploy on table. Once per turn, may deploy from reserve deck Maul's Lightsaber; reshuffle. At start of opponent's control phase, may relocate Maul to same site as a Jedi. May place this Effect out of play to deploy Maul's Lightsaber from Lost Pile. (Immune to Alter.)
lore: "At last we will reveal ourselves to the Jedi."
name: They Will Be No Match For You

gametext: Deploys -3 to a site with "Vader" in game text. Once during your turn, may activate 1 Force. Once per game, may take a card with "Vader" in title from reserve deck; reshuffle.
name: Vanee

dark_side_text: Once per game, if you occupy three battlegrounds, may retrieve a Black Sun agent into hand.
gametext: Once per game, if you control, may retrieve [Reflections II] Dash into hand.   Once per game, if you occupy three battlegrounds, may retrieve a Black Sun agent into hand.
light_side_text: Once per game, if you control, may retrieve [Reflections II] Dash into hand.
name: Xizor's Palace: Sewer
